Posts.EditableText: I've updated the Quest 5.0 Technical Preview: - you can now run all Quest games for previous versions: ASL, CAS and QSG files all work - there is a very limited preview of the Editor. More info here: http://www.axeuk.com/blog/2011/01/15/qu ... est-games/ Download here: http://quest5.net/
Posts.HTML:
I've updated the Quest 5.0 Technical Preview:

- you can now run all Quest games for previous versions: ASL, CAS and QSG files all work
- there is a very limited preview of the Editor.

More info here: http://www.axeuk.com/blog/2011/01/15/qu ... est-games/

Download here: http://quest5.net/
